message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point, considering its worth to you.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's worth to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the price. How about we meet in the middle at $13,250? This considers both our valuations.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above $13,250. How about we try $12,750? I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'd like to save a bit more
